thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Kremlin regrets CAS decision to dismiss Russian Olympic appeals

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Kremlin regrets CAS decision to dismiss Russian Olympic appeals
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - The Kremlin said on Friday it regretted a decision by the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) to dismiss 47 appeals from Russian athletes and coaches to take part in the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics.
CAS issued a statement on the matter earlier on Friday, putting an end to a months-long saga over their Olympic fate.
Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told reporters on a conference call that Russia regretted the decision and would continue to help Russian athletes defend their rights.
Reporting by Polina Nikolskaya; Editing by Andrew Osborn
